price: İşte orada Mü’minler denendiler ve şiddetli bir şekilde sarsıldılar.
arabic: هُنَالِكَ ٱبۡتُلِيَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ وَزُلۡزِلُواْ زِلۡزَالٗا شَدِيدٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: hunālika ub'tuliya al-mu'minūna wazul'zilū zil'zālan shadīdan
